org.spongepowered.api

Class Sponge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.Sponge

  • public final class Sponge
extends Object
    A static all access class granting static access to various systems for the API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sponge()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static AssetManager getAssetManager()
      Gets the AssetManager instance.
      static CauseStackManager getCauseStackManager()
      Gets the CauseStackManager instance from the Game instance.

      Gets the ChannelRegistrar for creating network channels.

      Gets the CommandManager instance.
      static ConfigManager getConfigManager()
      Gets the ConfigManager used to load and manage configuration files for plugins.

      Gets the DataManager instance.

      Gets the GameDictionary instance from the Game instance.

      Gets the EventManager instance.
      static Game getGame()
      Gets the Game instance.
      static MetricsConfigManager getMetricsConfigManager()
      Gets the MetricsConfigManager instance, allowing data/metric gathering systems to determine whether they have permission to gather server metrics.

      Returns the current platform, or implementation, this Game is running on.

      Gets the PluginManager instance.

      Gets the PropertyRegistry instance to register PropertyStores.

      Gets the GameRegistry instance.

      Gets the scheduler used to schedule tasks.

      Gets the Server instance from the Game instance.
      static ServiceManager getServiceManager()
      Gets the game's instance of the service manager, which is the gateway to various services provided by Sponge (command registration and so on).
      static TeleportHelper getTeleportHelper()
      Gets the TeleportHelper, used to find safe Locations.
      static boolean isServerAvailable()
      Gets whether a Server instance is available without throwing an exception from calling getServer().

    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        public static Game getGame()
        Gets the Game instance. There is ever only going to be a single game instance at any given time, except during the various extraneous GameStates that the game instance is otherwise unavailable.
        Returns:
        The game instance

      • getPlatform

        public static Platform getPlatform()
        Returns the current platform, or implementation, this Game is running on.
        Returns:
        The current implementation

      • getRegistry

        public static GameRegistry getRegistry()
        Gets the GameRegistry instance.
        Returns:
        The game registry instance

      • getCommandManager

        public static CommandManager getCommandManager()
        Gets the CommandManager instance.
        Returns:
        The command manager instance

      • getServiceManager

        public static ServiceManager getServiceManager()
        Gets the game's instance of the service manager, which is the gateway to various services provided by Sponge (command registration and so on).

        Services registered by other plugins may be available too.

        Returns:
        The service manager

      • getScheduler

        public static Scheduler getScheduler()
        Gets the scheduler used to schedule tasks.
        Returns:
        The scheduler

      • getChannelRegistrar

        public static ChannelRegistrar getChannelRegistrar()
        Gets the ChannelRegistrar for creating network channels.
        Returns:
        The channel registrar

      • getTeleportHelper

        public static TeleportHelper getTeleportHelper()
        Gets the TeleportHelper, used to find safe Locations.
        Returns:
        The teleport helper

      • isServerAvailable

        public static boolean isServerAvailable()
        Gets whether a Server instance is available without throwing an exception from calling getServer().
        Returns:
        True if the server instance is available
        See Also:
        Game.isServerAvailable()

      • getServer

        public static Server getServer()
        Gets the Server instance from the Game instance.

        Note: During various GameStates, a Server instance may NOT be available. During these specific states, calling Game.getServer() will throw an exception. To double check, call isServerAvailable()

        Returns:
        The server instance
        See Also:
        Game.getServer(), Game.isServerAvailable()

      • getDictionary

        public static Optional<GameDictionary> getDictionary()
        Gets the GameDictionary instance from the Game instance.
        Returns:
        The game dictionary instance, or empty if unsupported
        See Also:
        Game.getGameDictionary()

      • getCauseStackManager

        public static CauseStackManager getCauseStackManager()
        Gets the CauseStackManager instance from the Game instance.
        Returns:
        The cause stack manager instance
        See Also:
        Game.getCauseStackManager()

      • getMetricsConfigManager

        public static MetricsConfigManager getMetricsConfigManager()
        Gets the MetricsConfigManager instance, allowing data/metric gathering systems to determine whether they have permission to gather server metrics.
        Returns:
        The MetricsConfigManager instance
